sentences.english: And we christen the patients' bed with our final fuck.
sentences.chinese: 用我们最后的性爱，给病床命名如何？

sentences.english: Hundreds of boxes of shoes. A mannequin.
sentences.chinese: 医院病床，几百盒鞋子，人体模特。

sentences.english: The next morning, nurse Wu came to Mr. Chen's bedside.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早晨，吴来到了陈的病床边。

sentences.english: On hospital bed, Her tearful eyes dance gazed at him, Therefore they are married.
sentences.chinese: 病床上，她泪眼婆娑的注视著他，于是，他们结婚了。

sentences.english: The settlement cycle is 90 days for the medical expenses with hospital bed at home.
sentences.chinese: 家庭病床治疗费用90天为一个结算周期。

sentences.english: Hospital beds. Hundreds of boxes of shoes. A mannequin.
sentences.chinese: 医院病床，几百盒鞋子，人体模特。

sentences.english: I watched beside his sickbed for several nights.
sentences.chinese: 我在他病床旁边守了好几夜。

sentences.english: After a while, he would jump onto my mother's bed and sit beside her.
sentences.chinese: 过一会儿，它还会跳到母亲的病床上，紧靠她坐着。

sentences.english: One day quietly came to Amys bed side.
sentences.chinese: 一天悄悄来到了艾米的病床旁边。

sentences.english: He is known to have provided bedside care for his older brother during a period of critical illness.
sentences.chinese: 现已知道，在哥哥病危期间他曾在病床旁提供照料。

sentences.english: Pull the curtains round the patient's bed.
sentences.chinese: 把病床周围的床帷拉上。

sentences.english: This innovative work has taken fundamental brain science right to the bedside.
sentences.chinese: 这项创新成果把基础大脑科学带到了病床边。

sentences.english: Objective In order to study the use of the index of sickbed utilization in assessment of sickbed work.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨应用病床利用指数对床位工作进行评价。

sentences.english: Nearby mother's sickbed there was another door leading to the narrow veranda.
sentences.chinese: 母亲病床不远处有另一道门通向狭窄的阳台。

sentences.english: The bed is so narrow, how could it hold two people at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 病床那么窄，哪能睡下两个人？

sentences.english: Dad would sit by the bed and start reciting the alphabet.
sentences.chinese: 父亲坐在母亲的病床边，开始读字母表。

definition: to look after a hospitalized loved one
to be in hospital/to be hospitalized
sick personnel/person on the sick list/patient
to attend to the needs of (an invalid, disabled person etc)/caregiver
